pages.text: And strive in (the cause of) Allah with the striving that is due to His (cause). He has chosen you and He has not made any difficulty for you in religion, the religious dictates of your father Ibrahim, He had named you Muslims before and in this (too), that the messenger may be a witness over you ( by keeping an eye on you all) and you may be witnesses over mankind (by keeping an eye on them). So establish worship (salat) and give charity (zakat) and hold fast to Allah. He is your Guardian and an Excellent Guardian and Excellent Helper
Those who are humble during their worship (salat)
and those who keep away from what is vain
and those who are active in giving charity (zakat)
and those who guard their private parts
except from their mates or those whom their right hands possess, then (in their case) they are certainly free of blame
but whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the persons who transgress
and those who are keepers of their trusts and their agreements
and those who guard their worship (salat)
who will inherit paradise, they will stay in it
And We have indeed created man from something taken out from clay
Then We made it a sperm in a settling place

then We proportioned the sperm (into) that which clings and hangs like a leech, then We proportioned that which clings and hangs like a leech (into a thing like) chewed flesh, then We proportioned (the thing like) chewed flesh (into) bones, then We clothed the bones with flesh, then We developed him in another creation. So blessed be Allah, the Best of Proportioners
Then after that you certainly die
Then on the day of resurrection you will certainly be raised
